data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in Marseille.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Marseille.
Lorient drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Marseille at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 3, Benoit Bastien signals a Lorient throw-in in Marseille's half.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In the minute 5, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Lorient's Yoane Wissa is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Lorient's Trevoh Chalobah gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 13, Marseille have a goal kick.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
In the minute 14, Benoit Bastien awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Can Lorient capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lorient close to the penalty box.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lorient.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Lorient.
Quentin Boisgard (Lorient) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 21, Florian Thauvin for Marseille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Benoit Bastien signals a Lorient throw-in in Marseille's half.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Marseille.
Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
In the minute 26, Important block from the Lorient defence as Dario Benedetto fires in a strike for Marseille.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Pape Alassane Gueye of Marseille gets in a strike, but is off target.
Benoit Bastien awards Lorient a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Lorient have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Marseille at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Benoit Bastien signals a throw-in for Marseille, close to Lorient's area.

Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?

Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 37, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Dario Benedetto (Marseille) has received a yellow card from Benoit Bastien.
Benoit Bastien signals a Lorient throw-in in Marseille's half.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In the minute 39, Marseille to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Benoit Bastien awards Lorient a goal kick.
In the minute 42, In Lorient a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marseille's Florian Thauvin misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lorient.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 45, Can Marseille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lorient's half?
The first-half has come to a close in Lorient.
The second-half is underway at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 48, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In Lorient Lorient drive forward through Laurent Abergel. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Marseille.
Lorient are pushing forward but Quentin Boisgard's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Marseille.
In the minute 54, Goal! Marseille have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Leonardo Balerdi.
Florian Thauvin instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 54, Houboulang Mendes is booked for the home team.
Free kick Lorient.
Alvaro Gonzalez for Marseille has been booked by Benoit Bastien and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Marseille at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Marseille.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.

Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in high up the field for Marseille in Lorient.
The home team have replaced Terem Moffi with Armand Lauriente. This is the first substitution made today by Christophe Pelissier.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lorient.
Benoit Bastien signals a Marseille throw-in in Lorient's half.
In the minute 64, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Quentin Boisgard for Lorient drives towards goal at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Lorient are coming forward and Yoane Wissa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
Marseille needs to be cautious. Lorient have an attacking throw-in.
Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In the minute 66, Marseille needs to be cautious. Lorient have an attacking throw-in.
Benoit Bastien awards Marseille a goal kick.

Lorient have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a first substitution, with Morgan Sanson replacing Pape Alassane Gueye.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, The home team replace Quentin Boisgard with Adrian Grbic.
In the minute 73, Lorient surge into the attack at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir but Pierre-Yves Hamelâ€™s header is off-target.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Valentin Rongier (Marseille) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 74, Lorient's Andrew Gravillon has been booked in Lorient.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
In the minute 76, Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Goal kick for Marseille at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 79, In Lorient Marseille attack through Morgan Sanson. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lorient.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 80, Marseille's Florian Thauvin misses with an attempt on goal.
Lorient have a goal kick.
Nemanja Radonjic is replacing Florian Thauvin for the away team.
In the minute 82, Christophe Pelissier is making the team's third substitution at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir with Stephane Diarra replacing Pierre-Yves Hamel.
In the minute 83, In Lorient a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Lorient make their fourth substitution with Jonathan Delaplace replacing Houboulang Mendes.
Thomas Monconduit is on a sub for Laurent Abergel for Lorient.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 85, Lorient have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Can Lorient capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Marseille's half?
In the minute 87, Benoit Bastien awards Marseille a goal kick.
Marseille make their third substitution with Marley Ake replacing Dario Benedetto.
Duje Caleta Car is replacing Mickael Cuisance for Marseille at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Benoit Bastien signals a Marseille throw-in in Lorient's half.
Marseille are coming forward and Boubacar Kamara gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Benoit Bastien awards Lorient a goal kick.
Marseille's Marley Ake breaks free at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Lorient.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Lorient.
Throw-in Lorient.

Marseille have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Marseille at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
